programme.title: Eloise
programme.desc: A group of friends wind up seriously regretting their decision to break into an abandoned insane asylum. Psychological horror-thriller, starring Eliza Dushku, Chace Crawford and Brandon T Jackson(n)

programme.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem
programme.desc: A spaceship crash results in the infestation of a small town by aliens, so a Predator is despatched to hunt them down - and any superfluous humans who happen to get in the way. However, an even bigger threat is lurking in the area, in the form of a terrifying hybrid of the two extraterrestrial creatures. Sci-fi action sequel, starring Steven Pasquale, Reiko Aylesworth and John Ortiz(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky(n)

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre(n)

programme.title: Friend Request
programme.desc: A teenager meets a girl online, only to find she is a demonic entity intent on killing her real friends. Horror, starring Alycia Debnam-Carey and William Moseley(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg(n)

programme.title: Black Panther: Special
programme.desc: A special preview of forthcoming superhero adventure Black Panther, which sees the titular king of the fictional state of Wakanda take centre stage in Marvel's cinematic universe(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London(n)

Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg(n)

programme.title: The Greasy Strangler
programme.desc: A tour guide competes with his son for the love of a woman as a murderer terrorises their neighbourhood. Comedy horror, starring Michael St Michaels and Sky Elobar(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate risk-management consultant decides whether or not to destroy an artificially created humanoid. Sci-fi thriller, starring Kate Mara, Anya Taylor-Joy and Rose Leslie

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A foul-tempered Victorian miser who hates the festive season is visited on Christmas Eve by a series of ghosts. The spirits intend to make him mend his wicked ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future will hold for him if he does not change for the better. Animated fantasy based on Charles Dickens' novel, featuring motion-captured performances by Jim Carrey and Gary Oldman

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Two guys make a pact to lose their virginity before their senior prom, but things take an unexpected turn when one of them comes out of the closet. Comedy, starring Nicholas Braun, Hunter Cope and Dakota Johnson

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown

programme.desc: The Caped Crusader swings into action to save Gotham City from the Joker. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes and Zach Galifianakis

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle

programme.desc: A protective dad is far from thrilled when his daughter begins dating a foul-mouthed playboy millionaire. Comedy, starring Bryan Cranston, James Franco and Zoey Deutch

programme.title: Wolves At The Door
programme.desc: During the summer of 1969, four friends find their festivities ruined as intruders stalk their Hollywood house. Home-invasion horror, starring Katie Cassidy, Elizabeth Henstridge and Adam Campbell

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A disillusioned man learns his father was a member of a secret society of superpowered assassins dedicated to eliminating people who are destined to commit acts of evil in the future. Having inherited his father's special abilities, he is recruited into the organisation and must take on a former member who has betrayed it. Action adventure, starring James McAvoy, Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have rarely been higher and the rivalries never as fierce as Yugi Muto and rival Seto Kaiba return for an epic battle. Animated adventure, with the voices of Dan Green, Eric Stuart and Wayne Grayson

programme.title: xXx: The Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: The extreme sports-loving super spy is brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen and Toni Collette

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche

programme.title: Lowriders
programme.desc: A young LA street artist's life is complicated by his car-loving dad and ex-con brother. Drama, starring Gabriel Chavarria, Demian Bichir and Theo Rossi

While in the process of capturing an enemy activist, Zohan fakes his own death and moves to New York to begin a new life as a hair stylist. He is forced to use his combat training once more to defend his neighbourhood from a crooked landlord and his thugs. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, John Turturro and Emmanuelle Chriqui

Animated fantasy based on Charles Dickens' novel, featuring motion-captured performances by Jim Carrey and Gary Oldman(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: A gunslinger is driven to renounce violence by a tragedy, and decides to make peace with his father, a preacher who disapproved of his past actions. He discovers his father's home town is under threat from a gang in the employ of a crooked banker, forcing him to take up his guns once more to defend the residents. Western, starring Kiefer and Donald Sutherland, with Brian Cox and Demi Moore(n)

programme.title: Come And Find Me
programme.desc: A man's desperate search for his missing girlfriend takes him down an increasingly dark and dangerous path. Mystery thriller, starring Aaron Paul, Annabelle Wallis and Garret Dillahunt(n)

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato and Julia Roberts(n)

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn(n)

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A lifeguard teams up with a new recruit in order to scupper a criminal scheme. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: The singing rodents mistakenly come to the conclusion that their human friend Dave intends to get rid of them when he proposes to his girlfriend in Miami. With only three days until Dave pops the question, the trio embark on a desperate road trip across America to sabotage his romantic plans. Family comedy sequel, starring Jason Lee and Kimberly Williams-Paisley(n)

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato and Julia Roberts(n)

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn(n)

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A lifeguard teams up with a new recruit in order to scupper a criminal scheme. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra(n)

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A successful investment banker is left devastated by the death of his wife. A complaint to a vending machine company sets him off on a letter-writing campaign in which he makes a series of brutally honest personal admissions, providing him with the chance to make a fresh start in his life - as soon as he has finished destroying everything that used to matter to him. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Naomi Watts and Chris Cooper(n)

programme.title: The Selfish Giant Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Clio Barnard and young actors Conner Chapman and Shaun Thomas discuss making the British drama in an interview recorded at the 2013 Cannes Film Festival

programme.title: The Selfish Giant
programme.desc: Two boys with troubled home lives struggle to fit in at school, but find a purpose in their lives when a scrap metal dealer takes them under his wing. However, he begins to favour one of the youngsters over the other, leading to tension between the pair and self-destructive behaviour from the neglected lad. Drama, starring Conner Chapman and Shaun Thomas

programme.title: Thunder Over Arizona
programme.desc: An honest cowboy is mistaken for the notorious outlaw he killed in self-defence. Before he can clear up the misunderstanding, he is approached by a corrupt mayor who draws him into a conspiracy to wrest control of a silver mine from its rightful owners. Western, starring Skip Homeier, Kristine Miller, George Macready and Wallace Ford

programme.title: Destry Rides Again
programme.desc: A mild-mannered sheriff is assigned to clean up a lawless town ruled over by a ruthless gangster - but finds his biggest problem is a sultry saloon singer determined to exact revenge on him for resisting her charms. Comedy Western, starring James Stewart, Marlene Dietrich, Charles Winninger, Mischa Auer and Brian Donlevy

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: A distraught widow learns her husband was murdered for his part in a $250,000 robbery. The haul has gone missing, and his former accomplices are soon on her tail in the hunt for the missing proceeds. Not knowing where to turn, she takes up the offer of help from a dashing stranger, but is uncertain whether she can trust him. Romantic thriller, with Audrey Hepburn, Cary Grant, Walter Matthau and James Coburn

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama, charting the mission to track down and eliminate the pride of the German fleet, a fearsome battleship devastating British vessels in the North Atlantic, orchestrated by a British naval officer recovering from his wife's death in an air raid. Starring Kenneth More, Dana Wynter, Laurence Naismith and Karel Stepanek

programme.title: Tomorrow, When the War Began
programme.desc: Seven Australian teenagers return from a camping trip in the wilderness to find that while away, their country has been invaded by a hostile foreign power and their families sent to prison camps. They form a resistance group to fight a guerrilla campaign against the occupying forces. Action adventure, starring Caitlin Stasey, Rachel Hurd-Wood and Lincoln Lewis

programme.title: Prometheus Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Ridley Scott and actors Charlize Theron, Michael Fassbender and Noomi Rapace discuss the making of the sci-fi thriller

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: A spacecraft is sent to another world, following clues left in ancient artefacts, in search of aliens that may have created the human race. However, the explorers on board discover the extraterrestrials may not be the benevolent creatures they imagined, while the company funding the expedition has its own agenda. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller and Alien prequel, starring Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron and Idris Elba

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: A repressed ballet dancer leads a sheltered life, devoted entirely to her art. She pursues the lead role in a production of Swan Lake, but the director convinces her she will only be capable of dancing the part if she embraces her darker impulses. This leads her into a destructive relationship with a rival that threatens her sanity. Drama, starring an Oscar-winning Natalie Portman. With Mila Kunis, Vincent Cassel and Winona Ryder

programme.title: No Home Movie
programme.desc: Chantal Akerman's video portrait of her mother Natalia, an Auschwitz survivor, capturing the relationship between the two women and the film-maker's sister Sylviane as they have various conversations about family history and Natalia's memories of life as a European Jew from the 1930s onwards. In French

programme.title: Pursued
programme.desc: A brooding cowboy yearns to find peace, but his life seems to follow a tragic path because of the actions and hatred of a mysterious one-armed stranger and a forgotten incident from his childhood. Western, starring Robert Mitchum, Teresa Wright, Dean Jagger, Judith Anderson, Alan Hale and John Rodney

programme.title: Thoroughly Modern Millie
programme.desc: A naive woman leaves her rural roots behind to seek fortune and romance in 1920s New York. She finds work as a secretary to a business tycoon, but he happens to be madly in love with her friend. However, before long she is wooed instead by a smitten salesman. Meanwhile, back at her boarding house, she stumbles across a shocking criminal enterprise involving the landlady. Musical comedy, with Julie Andrews, James Fox and Mary Tyler Moore

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond

programme.title: The Land Girls
programme.desc: Three Land Army agricultural volunteers from very different social backgrounds are sent to work on a Dorset farm. Despite their differences, the three women become close friends, and one falls in love with the farmer's son. Wartime drama, with Catherine McCormack, Anna Friel, Rachel Weisz, Tom Georgeson and Steven Mackintosh

programme.title: Lady Bird Interview Special
programme.desc: Greta Gerwig and Saoirse Ronan talk about making their beautifully observed coming-of-age story

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Premiere. Aspiring painter Margaret Keane marries a controlling man who sells her artwork. As the paintings of large-eyed children grow tremendously popular, Margaret discovers he is claiming to have painted them himself, and she and her daughter are forced to live a lie for years - until she finally resolves to prove his deceit in court. Tim Burton's fact-based drama, starring Amy Adams, Christoph Waltz and Terence Stamp

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: Crew members of a cargo spacecraft answer a distress call from a derelict alien vessel. However, their mission of mercy has fatal repercussions when a deadly, seemingly indestructible monster gets on board their ship and starts killing them one by one. Ridley Scott's sci-fi horror, starring Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, Ian Holm, John Hurt, Harry Dean Stanton, Yaphet Kotto and Veronica Cartwright

programme.title: Wadjda
programme.desc: A rebellious 10-year-old Saudi Arabian girl desperately wants a bicycle, but her mother does not approve, so she hatches a series of money-making schemes to pay for it herself. She enters a Koran recitation competition with a cash prize, and develops a reputation as a pious model student as a result. Drama, starring Waad Mohammed and Reem Abdullah. In Arabic(n)

programme.title: The Turning Point
programme.desc: A journalist helps a crusading district attorney who has been given the task of cracking down on a crime syndicate, but the pair's efforts are hampered by political corruption. Film noir, starring William Holden, Edmond O'Brien and Alexis Smith(n)

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: Rancher Shep Horgan takes in injured drifter Jubal, and offers him a job. However, a jealous ranch hand takes a dislike to the new arrival, and tries to persuade Horgan that Jubal is having an affair with his wife. Western, starring Glenn Ford, Rod Steiger, Valerie French, Charles Bronson and Ernest Borgnine(n)

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: Police inspector George Gideon experiences an eventful day's work. He learns one of his detectives has accepted bribes, goes on the trail of a murderous maniac and tracks a woman suspected of robbery. He also helps foil a bank heist and gets off on the wrong foot with an eager young constable. John Ford's drama, starring Jack Hawkins, Dianne Foster, Anna Lee and Anna Massey(n)

programme.title: The Furies
programme.desc: The daughter of a ruthlessly ambitious cattle baron is divided between her love for one of his enemies and the prospect of taking over the family ranch when he dies. But when the cruel rancher has one of her friends hanged, she begins plotting his downfall. Western from director Anthony Mann, starring Barbara Stanwyck and Walter Huston(n)

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: A hot-headed swordsman sets off to join the King of France's royal guard, and falls in with a trio of former members who have fallen into disgrace. They join forces to defeat a plot to overthrow the king by an English lord who has built a deadly airship. Swashbuckling adventure, with Logan Lerman, Milla Jovovich, Matthew Macfadyen, Ray Stevenson and Luke Evans(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: A new student finds herself a social outcast during her first year of college, but soon acquires a new circle of friends in a band of misfits with a shared talent for singing. She joins their a cappella group and leads them to compete in the campus music competitions. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Elizabeth Banks(n)

programme.title: Aliens: Special Edition
programme.desc: Lone survivor Ripley is rescued in deep space decades after an alien creature wiped out her ship's entire crew. She is recruited to accompany a military expedition to a colony on the planet where she first encountered the monster, only to find the aliens have been reproducing and there are now hordes of them. Extended cut of James Cameron's sci-fi thriller sequel, with Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn and Lance Henriksen(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Rose's wedding is nearly cancelled when she discovers that she has a heart condition. Meanwhile, Cindy gets a job, but decides she wants to be a stay-at-home mother

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin falls in love with a lumberjack with a mysterious past. Meanwhile, Ike and Jim Bob hunt for uranium on Walton's Mountain

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls, Oleson and Garvey families get tired of the bustling city life and decide to return to Walnut Grove, where a shock awaits them

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: There's No Place Like Home - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The residents of Walnut Grove work hard to restore the town to its former glory for founder Lars Hanson, who the Ingalls family discovers has been crippled by a stroke. Drama, starring Michael Landon, Karen Grassle and Melissa Gilbert

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: The Hansen clan throw a surprise party for Jim's 60th birthday and try to talk him out of retiring while Syd is asked to perform ritual surgery so a man can convert to Judaism

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Robbie fills in for Heather at the clinic and Syd attempts to bring about a reconcilation between a pregnant woman and her estranged family

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to change the rules at a women's prison to allow the inmates greater access to their children

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to convince an ageing rancher that he is not too old to work with horses. Richard Farnsworth (The Straight Story) guest stars

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird

programme.title: A Woman of Substance
programme.desc: Emma's father dies while saving Edwin's life, so the maid vows to avenge his death. Drama, starring Deborah Kerr

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia embarks on a one-woman strike, prompting John to take her on a belated honeymoon after 19 years of marriage

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: As Hallowe'en approaches, a recovering Syd prescribes a dose that almost kills a girl, making her fear she may have returned to work too soon. To make matters worse, she also suspects her substitute, Dr Roberts, is conspiring to take over the clinic

programme.title: The Man Who Made Husbands Jealous
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's novel about Lysander Hawkley, a philanderer whose best friend edges him into a new line of work - patching up ailing marriages. Stephen Billington stars, with Kim Criswell and Hugh Bonneville

programme.title: The Man Who Made Husbands Jealous
programme.desc: Part two of two. Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's novel about Lysander Hawkley, a philanderer whose best friend edges him into a new line of work - patching up ailing marriages. Stephen Billington stars, with Kim Criswell and Hugh Bonneville

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain

programme.title: The Secret Sex Life of a Single Mom
programme.desc: A mother-of-two divorces her husband after learning of his infidelities, and is persuaded to take up internet dating by her friends. She meets a mysterious stranger online, who encourages her to take control of her own sexuality through encounters with a variety of men. Fact-based drama based on Delaine Morris' autobiographical book, starring Ashley Jones and Alex Carter

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Desperate Deception
programme.desc: A US Marine travels to France in search of an escaped Nazi. However, no sooner has he located his quarry, than the war criminal is murdered leaving the soldier the prime suspect. Enter the crusading attorney, who battles to prove his innocence - but to do so, he will have to uncover secrets buried for 45 years. Courtroom mystery, starring Raymond Burr, Ian McShane, William R Moses, Yvette Mimieux and Ian Bannen

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen intervenes when a 14-year-old girl is forced into marriage but ends up being kidnapped, and the Baldwins welcome their eccentric cousin Octavia to the town

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy heads to New York to pursue his writing career, and the Baldwin sisters plan a fancy dress ball, but both plans go awry. Final episode of the drama series

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert runs away from home, convinced Laura thinks he is trying to steal her father's affection

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mr Olesen begins writing a gossip column, causing considerable local interest and resentment from some quarters. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim begins spending time with a friend of Syd's who is also a photo-journalist - but she and Joanie are quick to interfere

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd is upset to learn Jim and Monica have grown closer and Joanie is rescued from a smoke-filled bakery by a handsome fireman. Robbie's streak of good luck on the game show shows no sign of running out as he continues to win huge cash prizes

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark makes a mistake that jeopardises the career of an undercover cop investigating drug dealing in a high school

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan spends Christmas trying to persuade a couple to save their marriage for their son's sake. Guest starring Wendie Malick

programme.title: Kidnapped: The Elizabeth Smart Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the abduction of a teenager from her home in Salt Lake City in 2002. The search for the girl turned into a nationwide media frenzy, but nine months later as hope was fading, she was found alive and well in the company of an unbalanced couple. Starring Amber Marshall, Dylan Baker and Lindsay Frost

programme.title: A Woman of Substance
programme.desc: Following her husband's death, Emma falls in love with an Australian soldier. Meanwhile, the Harte empire continues to expand. Conclusion of the drama, starring Deborah Kerr

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Charlie Harmon throws John a financial lifeline by offering him £5,000 for Walton's Mountain, but the deal comes with strings attached. Noah Beery guest stars

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: At the request of her handsome physical therapist, Syd encourages a dancer to abandon her dreams for the sake of her health

programme.title: Ungodly Acts
programme.desc: Police investigate the fanatical leader of a religious cult at the centre of a murder case. When a young woman is found dead, a man confesses to her murder, but admits a controlling cult leader forced him to commit the crime. Drama, starring Megan Park and Brant Daugherty

programme.title: Kidnapped: The Elizabeth Smart Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the abduction of a teenager from her home in Salt Lake City in 2002. The search for the girl turned into a nationwide media frenzy, but nine months later as hope was fading, she was found alive and well in the company of an unbalanced couple. Starring Amber Marshall, Dylan Baker and Lindsay Frost

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain

programme.title: Witness to Waco: Inside the Siege
programme.desc: An in-depth look into the Branch Davidians, a religious cult led by David Koresh in the late 1980s and early 1990s that ultimately met with a tragic, fiery end

programme.title: Prophet's Prey
programme.desc: Documentary about former Mormon fundamentalist leader Warren Jeffs, who held a dictatorial rule over his followers before being convicted of sexual assault on children

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family takes in a deaf girl and teaches her sign-language. First-ever episode of the drama(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The children agree to buy their grandmother a new pair of glasses instead of spending their money at the carnival - and get a fitting reward for their big-hearted gesture(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary expresses fears over marrying Adam Kendall, as she doubts they could safely raise children together(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Jonathan plan to show the boys a few things about the responsibilities of adulthood, but the tables are swiftly turned. Drama, starring Michael Landon(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A terrible headache leaves Syd experiencing bizarre hallucinations, where she encounters the characters from Alice in Wonderland. Joanie and fireman Burt look forward to a relaxing weekend away together - but find that their hosts at the remote B&B have other plans for them(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd has an out-of-body experience as Jim keeps a bedside vigil by her side. Elsewhere, Robbie is caught up in a potential scandal and firefighter Burt attempts to comfort a distraught Joanne(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Four orphaned brothers face being split up when a social worker places them in different foster homes(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan comes to the aid of a small town doctor whose health is failing, but who refuses to retire as his neighbours depend on him and there is nobody to take his place(n)

programme.title: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: US embassy worker Jan Lindsey is helped by Interpol agent Michael Hayden as she tries to prove herself innocent of a murder in the Greek islands. Thriller, starring Charles Dance and Alexandra Paul(n)

programme.title: Barbara Taylor Bradford's Hold the Dream
programme.sub-title: Barbara Taylor Bradford's Hold the Dream.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Emma Harte has arranged to pass control of her empire to her favourite granddaughter. Drama, starring Deborah Kerr, Jenny Seagrove and Claire Bloom(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa offers a few words of wisdom to Jason, who has just discovered a close friend has been diagnosed as suffering from a terminal illness. Ron Howard guest stars(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd is moved to act when she meets an illegal immigrant with a severe cleft palate(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Changes
programme.desc: Two single parents, a successful journalist and a wealthy, widowed heart surgeon, fall in love and rush headlong into marriage. However, the move proves to have far-reaching consequences for them and their children. Romantic drama, starring Cheryl Ladd, Michael Nouri and Christopher Gartin(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner(n)

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain(n)

programme.title: The Benefactor
programme.desc: A wealthy eccentric blames himself for the deaths of a couple, and looks for a way to make amends. He discovers that their daughter is now expecting her first child, so begins meddling in the lives of both her and her husband in the hope of securing them a better future. Drama, starring Richard Gere, Dakota Fanning and Theo James(n)

programme.title: Hunt for the I-5 Killer
programme.desc: Dramatisation of the year-long manhunt for American serial murderer Randall Brent Woodfield, who targeted women along the I-5 motorway in 1981. Thriller, starring John Corbett, Sara Canning and Tygh Runyan(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Grimacing Governor
programme.desc: A politician is murdered and his daughter soon points the finger of blame at one of his opponents - who protests his innocence, claiming the culprit is far more likely to have been very close to the deceased. Crime drama, starring Hal Holbrook, Barbara Hale, William R Moses, John Spencer and Gregg Henry

programme.title: A Woman of Substance
programme.desc: Following her husband's death, Emma falls in love with an Australian soldier. Meanwhile, the Harte empire continues to expand. Conclusion of the drama, starring Deborah Kerr

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Charlie Harmon throws John a financial lifeline by offering him £5,000 for Walton's Mountain, but the deal comes with strings attached. Noah Beery guest stars

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: At the request of her handsome physical therapist, Syd encourages a dancer to abandon her dreams for the sake of her health

programme.title: Ungodly Acts
programme.desc: Police investigate the fanatical leader of a religious cult at the centre of a murder case. When a young woman is found dead, a man confesses to her murder, but admits a controlling cult leader forced him to commit the crime. Drama, starring Megan Park and Brant Daugherty

programme.title: Kidnapped: The Elizabeth Smart Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the abduction of a teenager from her home in Salt Lake City in 2002. The search for the girl turned into a nationwide media frenzy, but nine months later as hope was fading, she was found alive and well in the company of an unbalanced couple. Starring Amber Marshall, Dylan Baker and Lindsay Frost

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain

programme.title: Witness to Waco: Inside the Siege
programme.desc: An in-depth look into the Branch Davidians, a religious cult led by David Koresh in the late 1980s and early 1990s that ultimately met with a tragic, fiery end

programme.title: Prophet's Prey
programme.desc: Documentary about former Mormon fundamentalist leader Warren Jeffs, who held a dictatorial rule over his followers before being convicted of sexual assault on children(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family takes in a deaf girl and teaches her sign-language. First-ever episode of the drama(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The children agree to buy their grandmother a new pair of glasses instead of spending their money at the carnival - and get a fitting reward for their big-hearted gesture(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary expresses fears over marrying Adam Kendall, as she doubts they could safely raise children together(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Jonathan plan to show the boys a few things about the responsibilities of adulthood, but the tables are swiftly turned. Drama, starring Michael Landon(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A terrible headache leaves Syd experiencing bizarre hallucinations, where she encounters the characters from Alice in Wonderland. Joanie and fireman Burt look forward to a relaxing weekend away together - but find that their hosts at the remote B&B have other plans for them(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd has an out-of-body experience as Jim keeps a bedside vigil by her side. Elsewhere, Robbie is caught up in a potential scandal and firefighter Burt attempts to comfort a distraught Joanne(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Four orphaned brothers face being split up when a social worker places them in different foster homes(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan comes to the aid of a small town doctor whose health is failing, but who refuses to retire as his neighbours depend on him and there is nobody to take his place(n)

programme.title: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: US embassy worker Jan Lindsey is helped by Interpol agent Michael Hayden as she tries to prove herself innocent of a murder in the Greek islands. Thriller, starring Charles Dance and Alexandra Paul(n)

programme.title: Barbara Taylor Bradford's Hold the Dream
programme.sub-title: Barbara Taylor Bradford's Hold the Dream.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Emma Harte has arranged to pass control of her empire to her favourite granddaughter. Drama, starring Deborah Kerr, Jenny Seagrove and Claire Bloom(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa offers a few words of wisdom to Jason, who has just discovered a close friend has been diagnosed as suffering from a terminal illness. Ron Howard guest stars(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd is moved to act when she meets an illegal immigrant with a severe cleft palate(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Changes
programme.desc: Two single parents, a successful journalist and a wealthy, widowed heart surgeon, fall in love and rush headlong into marriage. However, the move proves to have far-reaching consequences for them and their children. Romantic drama, starring Cheryl Ladd, Michael Nouri and Christopher Gartin(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner(n)

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain(n)

programme.title: The Benefactor
programme.desc: A wealthy eccentric blames himself for the deaths of a couple, and looks for a way to make amends. He discovers that their daughter is now expecting her first child, so begins meddling in the lives of both her and her husband in the hope of securing them a better future. Drama, starring Richard Gere, Dakota Fanning and Theo James(n)

programme.desc: The President tries to win back Ivanka Trump by supporting her progressive Paid Family Leave initiative, a move that sends his most loyal morning show co-host into an existential crisis

Don Miguel celebrates a birthday as his rivals close in, while Mexican Federal police move to crack down on drug trafficking in Guerrero. In Columbus, Special Agent James tracks down the missing suspect that may be the key to breaking open his case. Meanwhile in Akron, Laura and Dan locate their fugitive son Andrew and convince him to turn himself in for outstanding drug charges and enter rehab(c)

programme.title: Family Leave
programme.desc: The President tries to win back Ivanka Trump by supporting her progressive Paid Family Leave initiative, a move that sends his most loyal morning show co-host into an existential crisis(c)

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Before Chuck Wepner (Liev Schreiber) goes fifteen rounds with Muhammed Ali, he's a liquor salesman and father with a modest prizefighting career. His life changes overnight when, in 1975, he is chosen to take on The Greatest in a highly publicized title match. It's the beginning of a wild ride through the exhilarating highs and humbling lows of sudden fame. Elisabeth Moss and Naomi Watts costar

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar

programme.title: Eric Clapton: Life in 12 Bars
programme.desc: This documentary contextualizes Eric Clapton’s role in contemporary music and cultural history. Told through his own words, it reflects on his traumatic childhood, his difficult struggle with drugs and alcohol, the loss of his son and how he always found his inner strength and healing in music. It features extensive interviews with Clapton himself, along with his family, friends, musical collaborators, contemporaries and heroes – including late music icons B.B. King, Jimi Hendrix and George Harrison. Directed by Oscar winner Lili Fini Zanuck

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: Otto and Anna Quangel (Brendan Gleeson & Emma Thompson) are a working-class husband and wife doing their best to ride out the war in Berlin in 1940. When their son is killed fighting on the frontlines however, everything changes. They begin pouring their rage and grief into postcards emblazoned with anti-Nazi slogans, risking everything to get their messages of protest across the city. This seemingly small act of subversion rattles the regime, including a police inspector (Daniel Brühl) who will not rest until the culprits have been caught

programme.title: Rolling Stones: Sweet Summer Sun - Hyde Park Live
programme.desc: The biggest live show of the year: The Rolling Stones return to Hyde Park, London almost 44 years to the day after their legendary free concert in July 1969. Featuring their greatest hits across a career spanning 50 years, plus a special appearance by former Stones guitarist Mick Taylor. Highlights include 'Gimme Shelter,' 'Jumpin' Jack Flash,' 'You Can't Always Get What You Want' and '(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction.'

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(c)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, Charlie Wilson is a womanizing US congressional representative from Texas who is a member of two major foreign policy and covert-ops committees. After being prodded by his major conservative supporter, Houston Socialite Joanne Herring, Wilson learns about the plight the people are suffering in the brutal Soviet occupation of Afghanistan. With the help of maverick CIA agent Gustav Avrakotos, Wilson dedicates his canny political efforts to supply the Afghan mujahideen with the weapons and support to defeat the Soviet Union

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy

Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs.
